parameters.name: circuits
parameters.description: A single or list of QuantumCircuits.

parameters.name: expectation_operators
parameters.description: One or more expectation values to evaluate

parameters.name: transpiler_config
parameters.description: A collection of kwargs passed to transpile.

parameters.name: run_config
parameters.description: A collection of kwargs passed to backend.run.

parameters.name: use_measurement_mitigation
parameters.description: Use measurement mitigation to improve results.

return_values.name: result
return_values.description: A list of expectation values and optionally standard deviations.
